backend/main.mo: Backend canister implementing access control, admin login/reset logic, customer form submission, visitor analytics, and document storage using mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and functionality of each frontend file.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment instructions for building and launching the app on the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app, favicon, metadata, and hero image preload.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up routing, theming, auth-based profile setup, and an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when a user lacks admin access, displaying errors and navigation/logout options.
frontend/src/components/CustomerForm.tsx: Renders a multi‑field customer form with validation, insurance type selection, file uploads, and submission handling via a custom mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/DashboardFilters: Provides search, insurance-type filtering, and sorting controls for the dashboard using input and select UI components.
Displays the dashboard header with branding, user profile info, a fallback logo handler, and a logout button.
frontend/src/components/DashboardStats.t: Calculates and displays key submission statistics including totals, today’s count, recent activity, and most popular insurance type.
frontend/src/components/DashboardTable.t: Renders a scrollable table of customer submissions with formatted details, insurance badges, and document view/download actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Shows the site footer with branding, quick links, services, and contact info, including a fallback logo handler.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with branding, navigation links, logo fallback handling, and an admin login button.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section displaying a banner image, tagline, and key insurance statistics with animated UI elements.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Administrator profile setup dialog with form validation, mutation submission, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services section rendering a grid of insurance offerings with icons, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/SupportSection.t: Support section showcasing 24/7 assistance options including phone, chat, and quick response info.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Centralized branding constants defining logo assets, company info, and contact details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on user identity, with query invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Hook that performs periodic backend health checks using an anonymous actor and reports status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React context/provider and hook for authentication, managing identities, login flow, and persisted sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profile CRUD, admin checks, and error/optimistic handling using backend actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetAdminCredenti: Implements admin password-reset logic with its own actor initialization, authentication checks, and error-state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and brand color variables for light and dark themes based on extracted logo colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login page handling Internet Identity auth, password login, backend health checks, admin status verification, and credential reset dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page handling authentication, fetching forms, filtering/sorting, backend health checks, and access control.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage composing hero, support, services, and customer form sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorMapping.t: Utilities to categorize backend errors and produce user-friendly messages, including trap, auth, timeout, and network cases.
frontend/src/utils/logOnce.ts: Utility to log specific errors only once to avoid console spam, with helpers to clear logged keys.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with custom brand colors, container settings, theme extensions, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata capturing requirements, issues, and feature requests related to fixing admin credential reset behavior.
